name: Amusement Park
description: This drawing was made to express emotional sense, which would have an impression of disdaining any kind of joys when there is no one to share with. (Watercolor on A3 Paper)

name: An Original A4 Framed Artwork of "Cendikia (The Scholar)"
description: Made in late 2012 by Thafhan Muwaffaq, this artwork represents his salutation on persons who have great dedication in praising their time for study, and the growth of flowering tree of knowledge. The word of "Cendikia" was taken from Bahasa, which, in English term is "Scholar".

name: An Original Painting of "Merangkak (Crawling)", oil on 70x70 canvas.
description:
Made by Thafhan Muwaffaq, a struggling artist who had not any idea that he has great passion in drawing, since his early age. He has this awareness now, and keeps trying to express ideas through paintings. 
This painting is, however, a remark of visual interpretation of time concept--in its smaller scope, transition. 
His ground idea beyond this painting is; in a situation of transition, whether metaphorically or literally, people are crawling to rise and stand, and thus they might have the ability to run and fall down to crawl again. What matters the most still are knowledge one should bear and how to keep on going.
